channel.title: Help with server

item.title: Help with server
item.dc:creator: @fatalflaw fatalflaw
item.description:
@fatalflaw wrote:

i need help with my server ive portfowarded and tried everything possible buts it not working so i guess i need some1 to help me, i have the following problem, when i am on 127.0.0.1 server ip it works, when im not on it or change it to my no-ip.com ip adress it does not i need help, i search for serverip in client.java for my source, nothing shows up im assuming i only have to change it in the client, in the client i find something for client.java when i look up ‘server ip’ this is what i find:

Gui.server = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(null, "New Server IP: ", “New Server IP”, 1);
if(Gui.server != null && Gui.server != “”){

Do i change the ’ New server ip’ to my ip, do i change them both, or one, what do i do

and i have another problem, when i look up gui.java (there is none in source, i searched EVERYWHERE) i find these:

System.out.println(“Connecting to the server!”);
Serverip = “”;
//Serverip = “1”;
//launchURL(“http://www.google.com”);
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));

do i change the server ip here too? what do i change it to, i know i need to compile, but yea what do i do, and i also find this in gui.java:

if (cmd.equalsIgnoreCase(“Server ip”))
{
try {
String sServer = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, “Server IP #:”);
Serverip = sServer;

and another one that says:

	private void newIP(){
 try {
                    String sServer = JOptionPane.showInputDialog(this, "Server IP #:");
                    server = sServer;
                    sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(sServer));

and then this

public String Serverip;

what do i put, do i change the server ip for one of them? do i leave them alone? please help, i really am stuck, if you can, can you explain how i change the ip in the gui.java and client.java so i can connect to the server and my friends can to (and how can i make it so when i release the source people who join my server cant edit anything? what do i take out? what do i leave? help please, i know its a stupid question and alot of people seem to do it easy but ive truely exshausted everything and i have no idea what to do at this point…) this is the client and source i used https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,440269.0.html (it is 317 and it is a crappy source but im trying my best to learn java coding before i step up to a 500+ or something (or like a 417 i think it is thats inbetween, in not to egar to do it so soon i just want some experience before i make the jump.)

Edit: am i in the wrong section or something? every1 seems to be looking at it but no1 seems to be replying.

Read full topic
